#Chicago Cubs vs Pittsburg Pirates 8/30/2016

On 8/30/2016 the Pirates played the Cubs at Wrigley Field.  Here are some key highlights from the game:

*Kyle Hendricks pitched 7 shoutout innings and was given the win

*Aroldis Chapman was given the save.

*Anthony Rizzo has a two run homer in the first.

*The Cubs won 3-0
